Posts.Content: Jun 19, 2008 06:48AM kt56 wrote: Laura,   I experienced the same sensitivity/pain. I even wore things inside out because I couldn't tolerate any seams against my skin. After my incisions had healed the PS had me use lots of cocoa butter cream on my entire chest to keep the skin moisterized while going thru the stretching/expanding phase. This was very soothing and did give temporary relief. Katie
